name: Chicken Pot Pie
ingredients: 2 refrigerated pie shells (1 box) 2 cups chicken broth
1/2 cup margarine or butter 2 1/2-­‐3 cups cooked chicken (cubed)
3/4 tsp salt peas, celery, beans (whatever you like)
steps: Line pan with 1 pastery; fold under or trim any excess. Saute onion in margarine and then add flour and
liquid. Add remaining ingredients. Seasons to taste. Spoon into pie crust and top with second pie crust. Cut
slits on top and bake at 400 according to directions on pie shell box. Do not preheat oven -­‐ crust will burn.
